detail_desc: Dungarees in superstretch denim with press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with press-studs at the front. Chest pocket, back pockets, fake front pockets and a fake fly. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in sizes 4-12M.

Playsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Elasticated, drawstring seam at the waist, and side pockets.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sequined satin with a high waist. Concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell weave with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck and dropped shoulders.
3/4-length jeans in stretch cotton denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs with short slits in the sides.

Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Asymmetric seams on the skirt for added width. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with decorative bows at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Lined pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with a drawstring waistband, side pockets, and decorative seams at the knees.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Calf-length dress in patterned mesh with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wrapover with ties at one side and an airy, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes and a narrow heel strap. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jersey top with a slightly wider neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Calf-length kaftan dress in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, cap sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a collar, shirt front, sewn-on bow tie, button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with a smocked waist and straight, wide legs.
Short skirt in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, embroidered pattern and scalloped hem with broderie anglaise. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.

Strapless, lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust and silicone trims at the back. Side support and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps.

Padded canvas jacket with a fleece-lined, drawstring hood with a peak. Zip and wind flap with press-studs and a concealed hook and loop fastening down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Flap chest and front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and two inner pockets, one with a zip and one with a press-stud. Quilted lining.
Jumper in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a small metal decoration on one shoulder.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with elastication at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves.

Long coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Slightly wider sleeves with pleats and a decorative button at the cuffs. Lined.
Short shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist and tassels at the hems.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice bands.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in patterned scuba jersey with a high waist, pockets in the side seams and a concealed button and zip at the back. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with embroidery on the front, a V-neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with sequined mesh at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Denim shorts in soft, airy cotton denim with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Coat in soft, felted wool containing some cashmere with narrow notch lapels, large patch front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. No buttons. Unlined.

Kangol x H&M. Short, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood and Kangol logo above the hem. Contrasting colour zip down the front, discreet front pockets with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Jumper in a soft cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves in a relaxed fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top, covered elastication and a drawstring. Diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jacket in light sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Glittery fancy dress mask with holes for the eyes and an elastic strap.

Studio Collection. Rectangular scarf in soft, patterned satin with a slight sheen. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch, front and back pockets, and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch, coated twill with visible metal press-studs at the front and tapered legs with seams front and back and a zip at the hems.
Hair elastics.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.

Wide shirt in an airy weave with glittery threads. Pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the front of the shoulders. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Top in soft velour with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings. Two pairs are decorated with glass rhinestones and have pendants in different designs.
Straight-cut top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Regular fit.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with elastication at the back of the waistband and a tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases down the front.

Longer padded jacket in woven fabric. Lined hood with a drawstring, zip down the front and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Concealed zipped side pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Calf-length pleated dress in airy chiffon in a double layer at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a brushed finish and appliqué at the top. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam and flared flounce at the hem.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with decorative scalloped trims. Small collar and buttons down the front.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Short sleeves and embroidery at the front.
Knitted jumper with embroidered decorations, a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Calf-length dress in a rib knit with a sheen. Wrapover front with ties at the waist and long sleeves.
Swim top and swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
